query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT s.id) as total_services,
  COUNT(DISTINCT p.id) as total_prices,
  c.name as country_name,
  c.smshubCode as country_code
FROM countries c
LEFT JOIN prices p ON p.countryId = c.id
LEFT JOIN services s ON p.serviceId = s.id
WHERE c.smshubCode = 'brazil'
GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.smshubCode;
